001package com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.builders;
002
003import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.Message;
004import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.models.InsulinUnit;
005import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.models.MinsTime;
006import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.control.CreateIDPRequest;
007import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.control.DeleteIDPRequest;
008import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.control.SetActiveIDPRequest;
009import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.control.SetIDPSegmentRequest;
010import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.currentStatus.IDPSegmentRequest;
011import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.currentStatus.IDPSettingsRequest;
012import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.currentStatus.ProfileStatusRequest;
013import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.response.currentStatus.IDPSegmentResponse;
014import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.response.currentStatus.IDPSettingsResponse;
015import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.response.currentStatus.ProfileStatusResponse;
016import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.shared.JavaHelpers;
017
018import org.apache.commons.lang3.Validate;
019
020import java.util.ArrayList;
021import java.util.Comparator;
022import java.util.HashSet;
023import java.util.List;
024import java.util.Optional;
025import java.util.Set;
026
027/**
028 * IDPManager provides a loose abstraction over processing insulin delivery profile (IDP) response
029 * manages, generating the requests necessary to get a full state of the profiles on the pump, and
030 * generating request messages in the correct format for making mutations on pump profiles.
031 * <p>
032 * Instantiate an IDPManager, then periodically call {@link #nextMessages()} and invoke TandemPump.sendCommand()
033 * on the returned request messages until {@link #isComplete()}. When a response is received, pass it to IDPManager
034 * via call to {@link #processMessage(Message)}. Then {@link #getProfiles()} will return a list of profile
035 * objects consisting of segments, and you can perform modifications by performing the returned commands
036 * from {@link #createNewProfileMessage}, {@link Profile#deleteProfileMessage()}, {@link Profile#createSegmentMessage}
037 * and etc on IDPManager and each Profile.
038 * </p>
039 */
040public class IDPManager {
041    /**
042     * Wrapper class for an insulin delivery profile consisting of profile settings and all segments.
043     */
044    public static class Profile {
045        private IDPSettingsResponse idpSettingsResponse;
046        private List<IDPSegmentResponse> segments = new ArrayList<>();
047        boolean isActiveProfile;
048        public Profile(IDPSettingsResponse idpSettingsResponse, boolean isActiveProfile) {
049            this.idpSettingsResponse = idpSettingsResponse;
050            this.isActiveProfile = isActiveProfile;
051        }
052
053        public boolean isComplete() {
054            return segments.size() == idpSettingsResponse.getNumberOfProfileSegments();
055        }
056
057        public IDPSettingsResponse getIdpSettingsResponse() {
058            return idpSettingsResponse;
059        }
060
061        public int getIdpId() {
062            return idpSettingsResponse.getIdpId();
063        }
064
065        public List<IDPSegmentResponse> getSegments() {
066            Validate.isTrue(isComplete());
067            return segments;
068        }
069
070        public Message deleteProfileMessage() {
071            return new DeleteIDPRequest(getIdpId());
072        }
073
074        public Message duplicateProfileMessage(String newProfileName) {
075            return new CreateIDPRequest(newProfileName, getIdpId());
076        }
077
078        public Message setActiveProfileMessage() {
079            return new SetActiveIDPRequest(getIdpId());
080        }
081
082        public Message deleteSegmentMessage(IDPSegmentResponse segment) {
083            Validate.isTrue(segment.getIdpId() == getIdpId());
084            Validate.isTrue(segment.getSegmentIndex() != 0, "Deleting the 0th segment index is not supported");
085            return new SetIDPSegmentRequest(getIdpId(), 0 /* ??? */, segment.getSegmentIndex(),
086                    SetIDPSegmentRequest.IDPSegmentOperation.DELETE_SEGMENT_ID,
087                    segment.getProfileStartTime(), segment.getProfileBasalRate(), segment.getProfileCarbRatio(), segment.getProfileTargetBG(), segment.getProfileISF(),
088                    segment.getIdpStatusId());
089        }
090
091        public Message modifySegmentMessage(IDPSegmentResponse segment) {
092            Validate.isTrue(segment.getIdpId() == getIdpId());
093            int statusId = 0;
094            return new SetIDPSegmentRequest(getIdpId(), 0 /* ??? */, segment.getSegmentIndex(),
095                    SetIDPSegmentRequest.IDPSegmentOperation.MODIFY_SEGMENT_ID,
096                    segment.getProfileStartTime(), segment.getProfileBasalRate(), segment.getProfileCarbRatio(), segment.getProfileTargetBG(), segment.getProfileISF(),
097                    IDPSegmentResponse.IDPSegmentStatus.toBitmask( // 31
098                            IDPSegmentResponse.IDPSegmentStatus.BASAL_RATE,
099                            IDPSegmentResponse.IDPSegmentStatus.CARB_RATIO,
100                            IDPSegmentResponse.IDPSegmentStatus.TARGET_BG,
101                            IDPSegmentResponse.IDPSegmentStatus.CORRECTION_FACTOR,
102                            IDPSegmentResponse.IDPSegmentStatus.START_TIME));
103        }
104
105        public Message createSegmentMessage(int profileStartTime, int profileBasalRateMilliunits, long profileCarbRatio, int profileTargetBG, int profileISF) {
106            return new SetIDPSegmentRequest(getIdpId(), 0 /* ??? */, 0,
107                    SetIDPSegmentRequest.IDPSegmentOperation.CREATE_SEGMENT,
108                    profileStartTime, profileBasalRateMilliunits, profileCarbRatio, profileTargetBG, profileISF,
109                    IDPSegmentResponse.IDPSegmentStatus.toBitmask( // 31
110                            IDPSegmentResponse.IDPSegmentStatus.BASAL_RATE,
111                            IDPSegmentResponse.IDPSegmentStatus.CARB_RATIO,
112                            IDPSegmentResponse.IDPSegmentStatus.TARGET_BG,
113                            IDPSegmentResponse.IDPSegmentStatus.CORRECTION_FACTOR,
114                            IDPSegmentResponse.IDPSegmentStatus.START_TIME));
115        }
116
117        public Message createSegmentMessage(MinsTime profileStartTime, float profileBasalRateUnits, long profileCarbRatio, int profileTargetBG, int profileISF) {
118            return createSegmentMessage(profileStartTime.encode(), (int) InsulinUnit.from1To1000(profileBasalRateUnits), profileCarbRatio, profileTargetBG, profileISF);
119        }
120
121        private void processMessage(Message message) {
122            if (message instanceof IDPSegmentResponse) {
123                int idpId = ((IDPSegmentResponse) message).getIdpId();
124                Validate.isTrue(idpId == getIdpId());
125
126                int segmentIndex = ((IDPSegmentResponse) message).getSegmentIndex();
127                segments.removeIf(s -> segmentIndex == s.getSegmentIndex());
128                segments.add((IDPSegmentResponse) message);
129                segments.sort(Comparator.comparingInt(IDPSegmentResponse::getSegmentIndex));
130            } else if (message instanceof IDPSettingsResponse) {
131                int idpId = ((IDPSettingsResponse) message).getIdpId();
132                Validate.isTrue(idpId == getIdpId());
133
134                idpSettingsResponse = (IDPSettingsResponse) message;
135            }
136        }
137
138        public String toString() {
139            return JavaHelpers.autoToString(this, new HashSet<String>());
140        }
141
142        public boolean isActiveProfile() {
143            return isActiveProfile;
144        }
145    }
146
147    private final List<Profile> profiles;
148    private ProfileStatusResponse profileStatusResponse;
149
150    public IDPManager() {
151        this.profiles = new ArrayList<>();
152    }
153
154    public IDPManager(ProfileStatusResponse profileStatusResponse) {
155        this.profiles = new ArrayList<>();
156        this.profileStatusResponse = profileStatusResponse;
157    }
158
159    public IDPManager(IDPManager m) {
160        this.profiles = m.profiles;
161        this.profileStatusResponse = m.profileStatusResponse;
162    }
163
164    public List<Message> nextMessages() {
165        List<Message> messages = new ArrayList<>();
166
167        if (profileStatusResponse == null) {
168            messages.add(new ProfileStatusRequest());
169            return messages;
170        }
171
172        profileStatusResponse.getIdpSlotIds().forEach(idpSlotId -> {
173           Optional<Profile> profile = profiles.stream().filter(p -> p.getIdpId() == idpSlotId).findFirst();
174
175           if (profile.isEmpty()) {
176               messages.add(new IDPSettingsRequest(idpSlotId));
177           } else {
178               int segmentCount = profile.get().getIdpSettingsResponse().getNumberOfProfileSegments();
179               if (!profile.get().isComplete()) {
180                   for (int i=0; i<segmentCount; i++) {
181                       int finalI = i;
182                       if (profile.get().segments.stream().noneMatch(s -> s.getSegmentIndex() == finalI)) {
183                           messages.add(new IDPSegmentRequest(idpSlotId, i));
184                       }
185                   }
186               }
187           }
188
189        });
190
191        return messages;
192    }
193
194    public IDPManager processMessage(Message message) {
195        if (message instanceof ProfileStatusResponse) {
196            profileStatusResponse = (ProfileStatusResponse) message;
197            profiles.removeIf(p -> !profileStatusResponse.getIdpSlotIds().contains(p.getIdpId()));
198        } else if (message instanceof IDPSettingsResponse) {
199            int idpId = ((IDPSettingsResponse) message).getIdpId();
200            Optional<Profile> profile = profiles.stream().filter(p -> p.getIdpId() == idpId).findFirst();
201            if (profile.isPresent()) {
202                profile.get().processMessage(message);
203            } else {
204                int activeSlot = profileStatusResponse.getActiveIdpSlotId();
205                int activeIdpId = profileStatusResponse.getIdpSlotIds().get(activeSlot);
206                boolean isActiveProfile = idpId == activeIdpId;
207                profiles.add(new Profile((IDPSettingsResponse) message, isActiveProfile));
208            }
209            profiles.sort((a,b) -> profileStatusResponse.getIdpSlotIds().indexOf(a.getIdpId()) - profileStatusResponse.getIdpSlotIds().indexOf(b.getIdpId()));
210        } else if (message instanceof IDPSegmentResponse) {
211            int idpId = ((IDPSegmentResponse) message).getIdpId();
212            Optional<Profile> profile = profiles.stream().filter(p -> p.getIdpId() == idpId).findFirst();
213            if (profile.isPresent()) {
214                profile.get().processMessage(message);
215            }
216        }
217
218        return this;
219    }
220
221    public static boolean isIDPManagerResponse(Message message) {
222        return (message instanceof ProfileStatusResponse) || (message instanceof IDPSettingsResponse) || (message instanceof IDPSegmentResponse);
223    }
224
225    public boolean isComplete() {
226        return profileStatusResponse != null && profiles.size() == profileStatusResponse.getNumberOfProfiles() && profiles.stream().allMatch(Profile::isComplete);
227    }
228
229    public List<Profile> getProfiles() {
230        Validate.isTrue(isComplete());
231        return profiles;
232    }
233
234    public Profile getActiveProfile() {
235        Validate.isTrue(isComplete());
236        int activeSlot = profileStatusResponse.getActiveIdpSlotId();
237        int activeIdpId = profileStatusResponse.getIdpSlotIds().get(activeSlot);
238        return getProfileWithIdpId(activeIdpId).orElseThrow();
239    }
240
241    public Optional<Profile> getProfileWithIdpId(int idpId) {
242        return profiles.stream().filter(p -> p.getIdpId() == idpId).findFirst();
243    }
244
245    public void clear() {
246        profiles.clear();
247        profileStatusResponse = null;
248    }
249
250    public Message createNewProfileMessage(String profileName, int defaultCarbRatio, int defaultBasalRateMilliunits, int defaultTargetBG, int defaultISF, int defaultInsulinDuration, boolean profileCarbEntryEnabled) {
251        return new CreateIDPRequest(profileName, defaultCarbRatio, defaultBasalRateMilliunits, defaultTargetBG, defaultISF, defaultInsulinDuration, profileCarbEntryEnabled ? 1 : 0);
252    }
253
254    /**
255     *
256     * @param profileName alphanumeric visible name for the profile
257     * @param defaultCarbRatio carb ratio for the first profile segment in the profile (at midnight).
258     *                         value of '1000' means 1 unit:1 carb. value of '5000' means 1 unit:5 carbs.
259     * @param defaultBasalRateUnits basal rate for the first profile segment in units
260     * @param defaultTargetBG target BG for first profile segment in mg/dL
261     * @param defaultISF insulin sensitivity factor for first profile segment.
262     *                   value of '1' means 1 unit:1 mg/dL. value of '5' means 1 unit:5 mg/dL
263     * @param defaultInsulinDuration insulin duration via MinsTime constructor
264     * @param profileCarbEntryEnabled if carb entry is enabled in the profile
265     * @return filled message to send to pump creating the profile
266     */
267    public Message createNewProfileMessage(String profileName, int defaultCarbRatio, float defaultBasalRateUnits, int defaultTargetBG, int defaultISF, MinsTime defaultInsulinDuration, boolean profileCarbEntryEnabled) {
268        return new CreateIDPRequest(profileName, defaultCarbRatio, (int) InsulinUnit.from1To1000(defaultBasalRateUnits), defaultTargetBG, defaultISF, defaultInsulinDuration.encode(), profileCarbEntryEnabled ? 1 : 0);
269    }
270
271    @Override
272    public String toString() {
273        return JavaHelpers.autoToString(this, new HashSet<String>());
274    }
275
276}
